line.text: 'Agents only supply the stations you own. They are synchronized with Traders and other Agents.'

line.comment: * Collect data to sort the array.
* add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$t
* $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $f, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $colsize.04
* $t = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=104, 'Job Presets', null, null, null, null
* add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$t

line.text: 'Save these jobs in a new preset'
'The Agents will start importing when the stock is less than this value.'
'The Agents will start exporting when the stock is greater than or equal to this value.'
'The Agents will load the maximum amount that can fit inside the station that is importing the ware.'
'The Agents will load this amount, or the maximum that can fit inside their cargo bay if it's too high.'
'Agents respect the maximum sector distance setting of this Outpost, but cannot exceed 8 jumps.'
'Reminder: each factory has its own import-export thresholds that the Agents will always respect.'

line.comment: * for each $sanctuary in array $allSanctuaries using counter $index
* remove element from array $allSanctuaries at index $index

line.text: 'The Agents will import only if the stock of the targeted Outpost is greater than this value.'
'The Agents will export only if the stock of the targeted Outpost is less than this value.'

line.comment: * add custom menu heading to array $menu: title='Maximum Ships'
* add custom menu heading to array $menu: title='Priority'
* add custom menu heading to array $menu: title='Pause'
* add custom menu heading to array $menu: title='Opportune Deliveries'
* add value selection to menu: $menu, text='Opportune deliveries', value array=$values, default=$default, return id='sections.logistics.jobs.new.opportuneDeliveries'

sval.val: Agents only supply the stations you own. They are synchronized with Traders and other Agents.
Save these jobs in a new preset
The Agents will start importing when the stock is less than this value.
The Agents will start exporting when the stock is greater than or equal to this value.
Load maximum cargo amount (click to change)
The Agents will load the maximum amount that can fit inside the station that is importing the ware.
The Agents will load this amount, or the maximum that can fit inside their cargo bay if it's too high.
Agents respect the maximum sector distance setting of this Outpost, but cannot exceed 8 jumps.
Agents never trade with other factions.
Reminder: each factory has its own import-export thresholds that the Agents will always respect.
The Agents will import only if the stock of the targeted Outpost is greater than this value.
The Agents will export only if the stock of the targeted Outpost is less than this value.
Collect data to sort the array.
add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$t
$t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $f, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $colsize.04
$t = sprintf: pageid=8396 textid=104, 'Job Presets', null, null, null, null
add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$t
for each $sanctuary in array $allSanctuaries using counter $index
remove element from array $allSanctuaries at index $index
add custom menu heading to array $menu: title='Maximum Ships'
add custom menu heading to array $menu: title='Priority'
add custom menu heading to array $menu: title='Pause'
add custom menu heading to array $menu: title='Opportune Deliveries'
add value selection to menu: $menu, text='Opportune deliveries', value array=$values, default=$default, return id='sections.logistics.jobs.new.opportuneDeliveries'
